physDesc.additional: Script: 'bru tsha. Folio number on last folio (13a): bcu gsum bzhugs so. Lines per folio: 8; 4 on fol. 13b. Orthography: - A few inverted i-s - Some cases of palatalization - Occasional alternation of prefixes (e.g., rngos for dngos, ’thun for mthun) Interlinear insertions (lemmas of PVin). Abundant marginal and interlinear notes (glosses, additional or alternative subdivisions). Proofread.

body.ab: bla ma rnaMs la phyag 'tshal lo ||

slob dpon chos kyi grags pas mdzad pa'i tshad ma rnaM par nges pa 'di la don bzhï gsum ste | bstan bcos rtsom pa'i rgyu dang | rang gi bstan bcos kyi 'bras bu dgos 'brel gnyis kyis bstan bcos rtsom pa la 'jug pa dang | bstan bcos kyi rang bzhin dang | bstan bcos kyi don nges pas mdo mdzad pa'i dgosdgongs pa nges pa la spro ba bskyed pa'o |

dul lha dang | shan ti pa dang lo tsa ba ltar na dang po la lnga ste | 'gal bas khyab pa dmigs pa'i rtags dgod pa dang | don las don dang 'dra ba skye ba dang ¦ don yang ming
'brel pa med pa dang ¦ ming 'dzin ming snang pa tsaM gyi spyi rigs pa la don dang 'brel par snang pas khyab pas rang gi mtshan nyid kyi ming snang yang gsum gyis ming don dang ma 'brel bas don las skye bas A scribal note in dbu can corrects the reading to "skyes pa la" ming mi snang pas khyab pa dang | shugs la grub pa yul la °°°yul la ltos pa'i sbyor ba dang ¦ dngos su bstan pa yul can la ltos pa'i sbyor ba gnyis kyis skabs kyi don bsdu ba dang | sgra don bdag cig kyang don las skye ba la ming mi snang pas khyab pa dang | zhar la rnaM rtog srid pa'i yul yid kyi rnaM shes yin pa'o

lo tsa bas de yan chad kyis don gyi mthu skyes kyi rjes 'gro'i khyab pa °°°dpa bshad zin nas de'i ldog ston gsung ste de ltar na khyab pa grub pa na sgrub bya grubs du 'gyur bas 'di chos mchog ltar sgra spyi mi‹ng›ming snang pa dgag pa la lnga ste | 'di rtag pa rang rgyud du byed kyang rgyas thal gyur du byas so'dod pa ma gnod pa'i thal 'gyur bstan pa dang | brjod pa snang pa brda dran pa la ltos pas 'bras bu'i rtsa ba'i thal 'gyur gyi khyab pa sgrub pa dang | 'dod pa la gnod
thal 'gyur gyi khyab pa sgrub pa dang | de'i 'dod pa la gnod pa'i thal ba dang | bzlog pa'i rtags kyis rtsa ba'i sgrub bya sgrub pa'o ||
gsumgsumbzhi ste | skyes bu'i lung dgag pa dang | rig byed dgag pa dang | gsum sgra kun rang gi don la tshad mas dgag dang | don bsdugsung pa'o ||
gnyi ga la rigs pa'i gnod pa la shag kya blo 'i rjes su lo tsa ba la sogs pa ltar na gnyis ste | spyir bstan pa dang ¦ dpe la sbyar ba gnyis kyis mngon suM gyis gnod pa dang | 'thad pas gnod pa'o ||
tshad ma rnam par nges pa'i bsdus don | rigs pa smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi seng ges sbyar pa rdzogs s+h+yo ||
mang du thos pa'i dge slong rdo rje dbang grags kyis sbyin par bya ba'i chos s+h+yo ||
